description: Linkup is a web search engine for AI apps. Connect your AI application to the internet and get grounding data to enrich your AI\

actions.name: fetch
actions.description: Fetch a webpage and convert it to markdown format. Optionally render JavaScript, include raw HTML, or extract images.

actions.name: search
actions.description: Search the web for relevant content based on a natural language query. Perfect for grounding LLM responses with factual data.
